sourcesContent:
import { FC } from "react"; import bucket from '../../image/bucket.png'; import { useItemsContext } from '../../utils/ItemsContext'; import { Item } from "../../types/Item"; import { NavLink, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import left from "../../image/left.png"; export const Product: FC = () => { const { productCode = 0 } = useParams(); const { items } = useItemsContext(); const item = items.find((item: Item) => { return item.code === +productCode; }) return (
{item?.title}
Winary Poggio Al Sale
Grapes Sangiovese
Country {item?.country}
Alcohol Content 13%
Sugar Content Dry
Volume 0.75
0 {item?.price}
) }
